summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Nob Hill Avenue from Howe Street to McGraw Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, under Ordinance No. 12570 creating Local Improvement District No. 1111 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
